products.title: Turin 25mm Primary Red Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Opt for their primary red 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blind for a pop of colour in your home or office. Primary red is a wonderful colour perfect that reminds us of strength and passion. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it fits straight onto upvc frames with no need for screws or drills. Product id: db-dpfven0369 fabric colour: primary red s25022 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Infusion Asc Raspberry Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc raspberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Meadow Flower Asc Redcurrant Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their meadow flower range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Hive Blackout Berry Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackoutberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Persia Perfect Fit
products.description: This persia perfect fit blind, is a combination of their metal venetian blind and perfect fit frame to create an ideal blind for your upvc windows and doors. No screws, no drilling - innovative fixings.

products.title: Splash Scarlet Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash scarlet red is a bright and bold red perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous red blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
